name: That Time of the Month
description: What woman hasn't once or twice in her life, wanted to rip out her uterus and throw it at the wall?! Or stab it full of a thousand pins and show it who really is boss? Be it a rough time on the rag, or a menopausal mood swing, That Time Of The Month will be there for you in a way your mother never was. Inspired by ovarian cysts, That Time Of The Month measures approx 6” in both height and width. Her lining is pink, her insides are red and the ovaries are a lovely shade of cream.
